data.title: Philip Rivers

data.text:
Eddie Hearn Explains The Canelo Alvarez And Turki Alalshikh Beef

There was a disconnect between Turki Alalshikh and Canelo Alvarez. Eddie Hearn was the potential link and he explained how the introduction might have gone off the rails.

No one in the health care system, including the regulators, benefits personally from making sure the system works the way almost everyone thinks it should.

During a quiet month of August, St. Louis GM Doug Armstrong has spiced up the NHL news cycle by signing two young Edmonton Oilers players to rarely used offer sheets.

Marcelo Gallardo and River Plate face Talleres in the Copa Libertadores round of 16 this week. Victory would bring them closer to a historic home final in Buenos Aires.

Portugal's richly layered city of Porto is hot these days—as in mega-popular hot. The riverside Pestana Palácio Do Freixo is the place to chill out from the crowds.

The opening ceremony of the Paris 2024 Summer Olympic Games presented athletes aboard boats along the River Seine, traveling from Notre Dame to the Eiffel Tower.
